constructor.details: Owner is set to the deployer via Ownable(msg.sender). The DCS depends on external contracts for data.

params._peoToken: The address of the PeoCoin contract.
params._staking: The address of the staking contract implementing IStaking.

getScore(address).details: The score formula:      score = (tokenBalance * tokenWeight)                + (stakedAmount * stakeWeight)                + ((stakedDurationInDays) * timeWeight)      stakedDurationInDays = (block.timestamp - startTimestamp) / 1 days

params.user: The address of the user whose DCS score is being queried.

returns._0: totalScore The computed DCS score for the user.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateWeights(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: By adjusting weights, governance can influence the importance of token balance, stake amount, or duration.

params._stakeWeight: The new weight for staked amounts.
params._timeWeight: The new weight for staking duration.
params._tokenWeight: The new weight for token balances.

constructor.notice: Deploys the DCS contract and sets the owner.

getScore(address).notice: Computes the DCS score for a given user.

peoToken().notice: Reference to the PeoCoin contract, used to retrieve user balances.

stakeWeight().notice: Weight factor for staked amounts in the scoring formula.

staking().notice: Reference to the staking contract, used to get staking amounts and durations.

timeWeight().notice: Weight factor for time staked (duration) in the scoring formula.

tokenWeight().notice: Weight factor for token balances in the scoring formula.

updateWeights(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Allows the owner to update the weight factors used in the DCS calculation.
